channel.title: Smart Home Circle
channel.description: Articles about everything related to smart home. Here we explore what are the various ways we can integrated smart devices to Home Assistant and much more.

item.title: Connect & Automate Tuya Zigbee Smart Scene Switch To Home Assistant
item.description: This article will explore how we can connect and automate the Tuya Zigbee 4 Button Smart Scene Switch with Home Assistant
item.author: contactsmarthomecircle@gmail.com (Amrut Prabhu)

item.title: Custom Sentences For Voice Assistant In Home Assistant
item.description: In this article, we will explore how we can create custom sentences for your voice assistant in for Home Assistant
item.author: contactsmarthomecircle@gmail.com (Amrut Prabhu)
